title: Marijuana For Military Members: A Congressman Introduced A Bill That Would Allow It
description:
On today's ZBT we've got 5 rounds in the magazine ... Round 1: Eddie Van Halen Pulled A Gun on Fred Durst in the Early 2000s from an assault vehicle. Round 2: 53-year-old Bob Salem from Colorado also made history by becoming the first person in the 21st Century to push a peanut up Pikes Peak with a contraption taped to his nose. Round 3: Rep. Anthony Brown, a retired Army colonel, and former military lawyer, has introduced legislation that would require the Defense Department to review sentences for troops convicted of marijuana offenses as a first step in reforming the military’s justice system. Round 4: A former CIA software engineer was convicted on Wednesday of federal charges accusing him of causing the biggest theft of classified information in CIA history. Round 5: THE MILITARY IS FUNDING A "LIVING PHARMACY" SCIENTISTS CAN STICK INSIDE YOU. The device will use genetically engineered, light-sensitive cells to hack your body’s natural processes.
